titles: The prophete Isaye, translated into englysshe, by George Ioye
author: Joye, George, d. 1553.
date: in the year of our lorde 1531. the .x. daye of Maye] [1531]
publisher: By Balthassar Beckenth [i.e. M. de Keyser],
notes: Imprint from colophon (as corrected by STC).
Copy filmed at reel 2003:3 has leaves A3 and A4 bound and filmed out of order.
Reproductions of originals in the Cambridge University Library.
